scripts.build_apis: redocly bundle ./api_yaml_files/varas_foros_v2.yaml -o ./app/v2/varas_foros/varas_foros --ext json && redocly bundle ./api_yaml_files/looplex365.yaml -o ./app/v1/looplex365/looplex365 --ext json && redocly bundle ./api_yaml_files/cases.yaml -o ./app/v1/cases/cases --ext json && redocly bundle ./api_yaml_files/assembler.yaml -o ./app/v1/assembler/assembler --ext json && redocly bundle ./api_yaml_files/actions.yaml -o ./app/v1/actions/actions --ext json
